lenders.loan_because: My wife and I recently returned, October 2009, from a trip to Kenya and Tanzania. We loved Africa and the people we met. lenders.name: Gowtham
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that the advent of globalisation has hurt various domestic businesses such as sewing, and sustainable farming. Albeit the fact that globalisation has affected the entire world positively, it still has left these small scale industries to suffer as they find it impossible to compete with foreign imports.

I feel that people who have the confidence and willingness to work hard, should be given a fair chance.

I would like to lend to these small scale industries and help them compete in a free economic structure.

The fee is about 3.000 VND for an hour for each person. I think I could pay the loan monthly. I wonder if I could lend about 1.500 $ and pay it in 36 months.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with young students, some whose first language is English and some whose first language is Spanish. I teach them reading, writing, math, science, social studies, and more! However, they are the ones who really teach me! They are the most genuinely wonderful human beings, and all of the students I have had throughout my three years as a teacher have inspired me beyond words with their innate altruism and enthusiasm for learning!

lenders.name: paisley
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward and I want to give someone else the opportunity to accomplish their dreams and career goals. I am thankful to God and to everyone who has helped me in my career and I want to help someone else and inspire others to step up and do the same when they are ready.

lenders.name: Alannah
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I try to remember the world is much larger than the space I inhabit.  I have been blessed with more than I deserve and I want to help others who deserve more than they have.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing & Communications Consultant - I create email and web based communications & resources for employees of a large corporation.

lenders.name: Calandra
lenders.loan_because: I like supporting people who work hard for themselves and their families. Especially Sustainable Urbanism!

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: LOVE

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.occupational_info: I am interested in connecting with community leaders who are seeking expertise in the areas of sustainable growth and development with a particular interest in committing to building out, low carbon emission, approximately 10 acre school based village plans. www.greenschool.org

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because:
What all these guys are doing are genuine and require support from all of us no matter how small.
I loan because it makes me feel human and connected.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial and business adviiser mainly to government departments. I trained as an accountant.

lenders.name: Jade
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a leg up!
lenders.occupational_info: I help women lawyers run their business.

lenders.name: Marco & Gerry
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love to help people.
lenders.occupational_info:
Marco - Manages a French Restaurant, he plans to one day open his own hospitality establishment to make use of his amazing business skills.

Gerry works for a Telco comapany  managing the billing operations of accounts. In his spare time, he likes to read, write , cook & watch films.

lenders.name: Deborah Mykkell
lenders.loan_because: We simply need to help each other in order to make it a better for all.
lenders.occupational_info: Project Manager, Construction

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.loan_because: It is time to stop being a passive witness to the adverse living condition of our fellow mankind. I lend to those whom just a small contribution could make a lasting or pivotal difference in their living or social well-being.

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: After two recent visits to Vietnam I wanted to support women to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a university

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to!

lenders.name: Konrad
lenders.loan_because: I believe in hard working people.  Through hard work anything is possible.  I am an entrepreneur myself and love to support motivated, honest people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work within information technology, primarily in the area of the Internet infrastructure, and application development.

lenders.name: andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are trying to make an honest living.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with school children and people who struggle with something in their life, usually in their work or how they think about themselves.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: i like seeing people succeed at their business, i admire that and it is an inspiration to me
lenders.occupational_info:
i am a carpenter in new york city which means a lot of big buildings! 
my work has so much variety because it depends on the job what you need to do- for a skyscraper you could be doing anything from making the wooden forms that the concrete is poured into, or you could be the one seeing where the rooms go and building the metal framing and putting up sheetrock to finish the walls. or you could be working on a highway or bridge building that- really there is so much!

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: I feel that people in the third world countries need a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I feel proud of myself for loaning money to people that haven't got what we've got.

lenders.name: Gia
lenders.loan_because: I don't feel that anyone should suffer, or lack the means to improve themselves and their community. By helping some, we help ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother to one child, a beautiful girl
